Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

Game.page1:
Select 8 of 16 gravestones in search of ghostly riches!

Find a prize to win instantly or collect Bonus symbols to trigger the bonuses!
Game.page2:
3 {coffinSymbol}{line1complete}Collected triggers the Coffin Capers Bonus.

Select 1 of 2 coffins in each round to capture spirits in the spirit meter.
Collect enough spirits in the meter to win a prize and advance to the next round. Only the prize from the last round completed is awarded.
The bonus ends when the spirits escape without filling the meter, or if the top prize is awarded.
Game.page3:
3 {organSymbol}{line1complete}Collected triggers the Organ Donor Bonus.

Select Organ Keys to reveal a cash prize or a multiplier.
Reveal COLLECT to end the Bonus.
Game.coffinBonusTutorial:
SELECT A COFFIN TO UNLEASH SPIRITS AND CAPTURE THEM IN THE SPIRIT METER.

REACH THE {icon_help_blueLine} OR {icon_help_yellowLine} TO WIN THE PRIZE AND ADVANCE TO THE NEXT ROUND.

DONâ€™T, AND THIS BONUS IS LAID TO REST!
Game.coffinMessageStart: SELECT A COFFIN TO RELEASE SPIRITS!
Game.organBonusTutorial:
PRESS AN ACTIVE KEY TO REVEAL CASH PRIZES OR MULTIPLIERS.

ONE KEY CAN BE PRESSED AT ANY ONE TIME.

BONUS ENDS WHEN COLLECT IS REVEALED.
